Interface BoardListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
DalekGame
All Known Implementing Classes:
CatchGame
public interface BoardListener

This interface defines a listener for receiving board clicks, which are mouse clicks on a square in your implementation of the Board class. A class that is interested in receiving such events should implement this interface. Objects created from such a class can then be registered with a component using the addBoardListener method. When a mouse click occurs on a square in the board, a Coordinate object giving the position of that click is created and is used as the parameter to the squareClicked method, which is invoked on the registered board listener object. This listener replaces the getClick method that existed in the original version of the Board class.

Method Summary
 void squareClicked(Coordinate coord)
          Invoked when a square is clicked on the board.
 

Method Detail

squareClicked

void squareClicked(Coordinate coord)
Invoked when a square is clicked on the board.

Parameters:
coord - the coordinates of the click on the board.
